data.name: Cyclops
data.description: Cyclops grants his teammates extra attacks and assails his enemies with optic blasts.

starItems.name: Cyclops
starItems.description: Cyclops grants his teammates extra attacks and assails his enemies with optic blasts.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary target.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call a random ally to attack the most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemy

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call a random ally to attack the most injured of those previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to call a random ally to attack the most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemy

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to call a random ally to attack the most injured of those previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Always call a random ally to attack the most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemy

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. Call a random ally to attack the most injured of those previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Call a second random ally to attack the second most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemy

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to each attack one of the previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to each attack one of the previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> highest Health <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies or self

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured non-summoned non-primary target enemies, ignoring <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to each attack one of the previous enemies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> highest Health <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies or self.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Barrier the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

7.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Turn and on <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy.
1.nextUpgrade:
On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus

2.description:
On Turn and on <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy.

On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade: When an enemy attacks an ally Phoenix, ally Dark Phoenix, or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage

3.description:
On Turn and on <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy.

When an enemy attacks an ally Phoenix, ally Dark Phoenix, or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> damage when an enemy attacks an ally Phoenix, ally Dark Phoenix, or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally
On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, fill a random Wolverine, Magik, or Forge ally's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color>

4.description:
On Turn and on <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy.

When an enemy attacks an ally Phoenix, ally Dark Phoenix, or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill a random Wolverine, Magik, or Forge ally's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on self or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>40</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus

5.description:
On self or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on self or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally turn, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>40</color>.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy.

When an enemy attacks an ally Phoenix, ally Dark Phoenix, or <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

On non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill a random Wolverine, Magik, or Forge ally's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
